Thanks for filling out Step 1 of the applicaiton, . Keep the ball rolling and get started on Step 2. Have any questions? Reach out to us at fellowship-staff@codeforamerica.org.


Start Step 2: Written Responses


Application Steps
There are 3 steps in the application process — you already completed the first!.

Step 1: Basic Information Finished!
Quick questions about you, your skill set, and your background (5 minutes)

Step 2: Written Responses
In-depth questions about your interest in the fellowship. (15-30 minutes)

Step 3: Skills Challenge
A 20-30 minute task that tests your chosen skillset.
